content.rendered:
As a child my family moved from South Yorkshire to the local area in 1987 because my father started work on Asfordby mine. I went to school in Grantham and College in Newark, where I also did my apprenticeship in Mechanical and Electrical Engineering. After Studying Control Engineering at University and starting my career in Cyber Security I moved back to Grantham in 2015.

I’m enthusiastic and highly motivated to take the skills I’ve developed during my career in the private sector and apply this to Lincolnshire Policing to get the best for Lincolnshire.

Below is a list of my personal priorities:

  • Cut all council tax towards the office of the PCC to ZERO – Saving each household between £200 – £600 a year
  • Provide the People of Lincolnshire with face to face contact to address concerns/complaints about Lincolnshire Police.
  • Increase visible Policing – “Boots on the ground” does make a difference!
  • Disband the Office of the Police & Crime Commissioner and put any remaining funds directly into Lincolnshire Police Force.
  • Push to ban all Police officers from dancing while on duty/in uniform
  • Trim the fat of “Middle Management” in Lincolnshire Police Force
  • Review all outsourced service and make cuts across the board – we shouldn’t have third parties making massive profits from tax payers money.
  • Put a stop to police investigating “non-crime hate incidents” and focus on actual crimes
  • Change the hiring policy away from diversity hires and university programmed graduates, and move to hiring the best candidates for the job.
  • Immediately stop any Police policies that move the county towards a Police State.
  • Push for “Zero Tolerance” approach to Crime
  • Stop any existing green polices or moves towards NET-ZERO
  • Stop “Woke” Policing

Peter Anthony Escreet, Church Trees House, Swinegate 38 & 38a, Grantham NG31 6RL
